Description: Net-sinker made of beige steatite, roughly rectangular in section, one end is tapered, the other end is short and square. The short end shows one groove incised that is not completely circumferential, the other tapered end shows no groove and therefore the object might be unfinished. The surface is smooth.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.5, above Ramesside floor
